52.name: Joker
52.description: Wildcard that substitutes any traditional card. ^blue(+100 points)^ and ^violet(+1 multi)^

252.name: Joker of Neon
252.description: Substitutes any traditional card. ^blue(+200 points)^ and ^violet(+2 multi)^

608.name: Change to Clubs
608.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Clubs card

609.name: Change to Diamonds
609.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Diamonds card

610.name: Change to Hearts
610.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Hearts card

611.name: Change to Spades
611.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Spades card

612.name: Change to Neon
612.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Neon card

613.name: Wildcard
613.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Wildcard

10000.name: Multiplied Hearts
10000.description: Adds ^violet(+2 multi)^ for every played Heart suited card

10001.name: Multiplied Clubs
10001.description: Adds ^violet(+2 multi)^ for every played Clubs suited card

10002.name: Multiplied Diamonds
10002.description: Adds ^violet(+2 multi)^ for every played Diamonds suited card

10003.name: Multiplied Spades
10003.description: Adds ^violet(+2 multi)^ for every played Spades suited card

10004.name: Pair Booster
10004.description: Level up PAIR hand by 4 levels. (+40 points +4 multi)

10005.name: Two Pair Booster
10005.description: Level up TWO PAIR hand by 4 levels. (+80 points +4 multi)

10006.name: Straight Booster
10006.description: Level up STRAIGHT hand by 4 levels. (+100 points +8 multi)

10007.name: Flush Booster
10007.description: Level up FLUSH hand by 4 levels. (+100 points +8 multi)

10008.name: Easy Straight
10008.description: Straight hand can be done with 4 cards

10009.name: Easy Flush
10009.description: Flush hand can be done with 4 cards

10010.name: Joker Booster
10010.description: All played Jokers scores double points and double multi

10011.name: Power-up Booster
10011.description: All played Power-ups scores double points and double multi

10012.name: Figures Booster
10012.description: All played FIGURES cards scores ^blue(+50 points)^

10013.name: Multiplied Aces
10013.description: Adds ^violet(+5 multi)^ for every played Ace card

10014.name: Love is in the air
10014.description: All played cards are considered Heart suited

10015.name: The hand thief
10015.description: Adds +1 hands and +1 discards to the round

10018.name: Neon bonus
10018.description: All Neon cards scores ^blue(+20 points)^. Neon plays are leveled up by 2 extra levels.

10019.name: Deadline
10019.description: When playing your last hand, increase the play level 10 times

10020.name: Initial advantage
10020.description: The first played hand scores ^blue(+100 points)^ and ^violet(+10 multi)^

10021.name: Lucky hand
10021.description: Adds ^yellow(+50 cash)^ for every Diamond suited card played

10022.name: Discard mastery
10022.description: Adds ^violet(+10 multi)^ if you have no discards left

10023.name: Second chance
10023.description: When you lose, this card gets destroyed but you can continue playing

10024.name: Guardian's shield
10024.description: Blocks all rage cards for 1 round. Gets destroyed afterwards

10025.name: Neon synergy
10025.description: If more than 50% of the played cards are neon, all the other cards get converted to neon

10026.name: Neon Doctrine
10026.description: Convert two played cards into neon cards.

10031.name: Shortcut
10031.description: Reduces the points needed to beat the round by 20%

10032.name: Lucky Payday
10032.description: Get extra ^yellow(+500 cash)^ for every Joker in hand at the end of the round

10033.name: Mirror effect
10033.description: Repeats the effect of the special card in the left

10035.name: Bonus Picks
10035.description: 2 extra special card options in the store

10036.name: Joker's drop
10036.description: Get ^yellow(+500 cash)^ every time you discard a Joker

10039.name: Scaling factor
10039.description: Upgrade all your hands by 2 levels

10041.name: Undying Draw
10041.description: First discarded hand gets leveled up

10042.name: Shielded Start
10042.description: Protects your first played hand from all negative effects

10043.name: Full House Booster
10043.description: Level up Full house hand by 4 levels. (+100 points +8 multi)

10044.name: Three of a Kind Booster
10044.description: Level up Three of a Kind hand by 4 levels. (+80 points +4 multi)

10045.name: Four of a Kind Booster
10045.description: Level up Four of a Kind hand by 4 levels. (+120 points +8 multi)

10046.name: Five of a Kind Booster
10046.description: Level up Five of a Kind hand by 4 levels. (+140 points +12 multi)

10047.name: Dice of Hearts
10047.description: Rolls a number between ^violet(-2)^ and ^violet(6)^ to add to the ^violet(multi)^ for each played Hearts suited card.

10048.name: Dice of Clubs
10048.description: Rolls a number between ^violet(-2)^ and ^violet(6)^ to add to the ^violet(multi)^ for each played Clubs suited card.

10049.name: Dice of Diamonds
10049.description: Rolls a number between ^violet(-2)^ and ^violet(6)^ to add to the ^violet(multi)^ for each played Diamonds suited card.

10050.name: Dice of Spades
10050.description: Rolls a number between ^violet(-2)^ and ^violet(6)^ to add to the ^violet(multi)^ for each played Spades suited card.

10051.name: Special Multiplier
10051.description: Adds ^violet(+3 multi)^ for each active special card

10053.name: Fury Reset
10053.description: Allows rerolling Rage cards once per round. Costs 500 per Rage card in the round.

10054.name: Skip Bonus
10054.description: Gain  ^blue(+25 points)^ (stacking) for each loot box skipped (opened without selecting a card). Currently  ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

10056.name: Slot Saver
10056.description: Earn ^blue(+100 points)^ for each unlocked but empty card slot.

10059.name: Club Keeper
10059.description: Earn  ^blue(+10 points)^ for each Club card in your deck.

10060.name: Spade Trio
10060.description: If your hand contains at least 3 Spade cards, adds ^blue(+100 points)^ and ^violet(+3 multi)^.

10061.name: Twos Matter
10061.description: Adds ^blue(+30 points)^ for every 2 held in your hand.

10062.name: Hand of modifiers
10062.description: Adds ^violet(+5 multi)^ for each modifier card held in your hand.

10064.name: Quad Multiplier
10064.description: ^violet(+4 multi)^ for every 4 card held in your hand.

10065.name: Jackpot
10065.description: Adds ^blue(+30 points)^ for every Jack held in your hand.

10067.name: Specials Hunter
10067.description: Double the probability on finding A and S specials cards on the store.

10068.name: King's Faith
10068.description: Each King played has a 50% of chance to grant ^yellow(+100 cash)^. Each King held in hand has a 25% chance to score ^blue(+100 points)^.

10069.name: Arithmomania
10069.description: If the sum of the cards you played is even, adds ^violet(+7 multi)^. If it's odd, adds ^blue(+100 points)^.

10070.name: Black and Red
10070.description: Heart and Diamond suited cards add double points. Club and Spade suited cards add ^violet(+1 multi)^.

10071.name: Worthless Jokers
10071.description: Jokers score ^blue(0 points)^ and ^violet(0 multi)^. Every other card scores ^violet(+1 multi)^.

10072.name: Rising Ladder
10072.description: Gain ^blue(+10 points)^ (stacking) for every straight played. Currently at ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

10073.name: Relativity
10073.description: Converts any straight into a 10-Ace straight (the higher possible straight).

10079.name: Rainbow
10079.description: Adds ^blue(+200 points)^ and ^violet(+5 multi)^ if your play includes all four suits.

10080.name: Queens Fortune
10080.description: Each Queen that scores has a 50% chance to grant ^yellow(+150 cash)^.

10101.name: Faded Poster
10101.description: Starts at ^blue(+100 points)^, loses ^blue(10 points)^ per play until it reaches ^blue(10 points)^. Currently ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

10102.name: Tamer of Chances
10102.description: Swap one discard for one play.

10103.name: Blackjack
10103.description: If card values sum under 21, adds ^blue(+21 points)^; if exactly 21, adds ^violet(+21 multi)^.

10104.name: Point Juggler
10104.description: Discarded cards give their value ^blue(×10 points)^.

10105.name: Deck Collector
10105.description: Earn ^blue(+1 points)^ for every card in your deck.

10106.name: Circle of Fortune
10106.description: Rolls a random number between 0 and 36; if even, result on ^blue(points x2)^; if odd, result on ^yellow(cash x2)^; if 0, ^blue(+300 points)^.

10107.name: Hestia Blessing
10107.description: Burned cards accumulate their ^blue(points)^; if it's a Joker, ^violet(+1 multi)^ is accumulated. Currently ^blue(+{{points}} points)^  ^violet(+{{multi}} multi)^.

10108.name: Suit Roulette
10108.description: Choose a random suit each play; adds ^violet(+5 multi)^ for each card of that suit played.

10109.name: Hanged Joker
10109.description: If your hand contains a joker, it has a 25% chance to accumulate ^blue(+10 points)^. Currently ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

10110.name: Special Sacrifice
10110.description: Gain ^violet(+1 multi)^ (stacking) for every special card sold. Currently ^violet(+{{multi}} multi)^.

10111.name: High Roller
10111.description: Each High Card played has a 50% chance to gain ^violet(+1 multi)^ (stacking). Currently ^violet(+{{multi}} multi)^.

10112.name: Efficient Play
10112.description: Earn ^violet(+10 multi)^ and ^blue(+50 points)^ when playing 3 or fewer cards.

10113.name: Rage Breaker
10113.description: Gain ^violet(+3 multi)^ (stacking) for each Rage defeated. Currently ^violet(+{{multi}} multi)^.

10114.name: Burning Rewards
10114.description: Gain ^blue(+15 points)^ (stacking) for each card burned from your deck. Currently  ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

19901.name: Lucky Cashback
19901.description: 50% chance to add ^yellow(+150 cash)^ when playing or discarding.

19902.name: Resonant Multiplier
19902.description: For every card with a value under 5, adds ^violet(multi)^ equal to its value.

19903.name: Swamp Redemption
19903.description: Gains between ^blue(+1)^ and ^blue(+5 points)^ (stacking) each time you discard. Currently ^blue(+{{points}} points)^.

20001.name: Broken Hearts
20001.description: Heart suited cards will not score during this round

20002.name: Broken Clubs
20002.description: Club suited cards will not score during this round

20003.name: Broken Diamonds
20003.description: Diamond suited cards will not score during this round

20004.name: Broken Spades
20004.description: Spade suited cards will not score during this round

20005.name: Broken Jokers
20005.description: Jokers will not score during this round

20006.name: Diminished Hold
20006.description: Your hand will be reduced by 2 cards during this round

20007.name: Zero Waste
20007.description: You have no discards during this round

20008.name: Unexpected Sacrifice
20008.description: One of your special cards got sacrificed

20009.name: Strategic Quartet
20009.description: You can only play up to 4 cards during this round

20010.name: Dynamic Tactics
20010.description: The same hand cannot be played twice

20011.name: Balanced Trade-off
20011.description: A poker play is worth double, another half

20012.name: Broken Figures
20012.description: Figures (Jack, Queen and King) will not score during this round

20013.name: Broken Modifiers
20013.description: Modifiers will not work during this round

20014.name: Last Words
20014.description: Silence the most repeated card in the deck

20015.name: Greedy Trap
20015.description: Deduct 200 for each hand played and 100 for each discard

20017.name: Spider’s Snare
20017.description: Special cards have no effect on the first hand played

20018.name: Perpetual Curse
20018.description: Silence a random card in each hand played

20020.name: Double Trouble
20020.description: You have to make double points in this round

20021.name: Betraying the Weak
20021.description: Cards with a value of 5 or less will not score during this round

20022.name: Locked Plays
20022.description: You can only play one hand type in this round

20023.name: Punched Ticket
20023.description: You can't play the same hand twice in this round

20025.name: Buzzkiller
20025.description: Your most-played hand does not count this round.

1.name: Basic loot box
1.description: Contains mostly traditional cards and modifiers
1.details:
2% chance of getting a special card
5% chance of getting a modifier card
4% chance of getting a Joker
1% chance of getting a Neon Joker
88% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

2.name: Advanced loot box
2.description: Can contain a special card or joker
2.details:
4% chance of getting a special card
10% chance of getting a modifier card
8% chance of getting a Joker
2% chance of getting a Neon Joker
76% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

3.name: Jokers loot box
3.description: More chances of getting a Joker
3.details:
15% chance of getting a Joker
1% chance of getting a Neon Joker
84% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

4.name: Specials loot box
4.description: More chances of getting a special card
4.details:
25% chance of getting a special card
15% chance of getting a modifier
60% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 3

5.name: Modifiers loot box
5.details:
50% chance of getting a modifier
50% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

6.name: Figures loot box
6.details:
70% chance of getting a figure
30% chance of getting other traditional cards
Loot box size 5

7.name: The Deceitful Joker loot box
7.details:
1 guaranteed Joker
9% chance of getting a Joker
1% chance of getting a Neon Joker
90% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 4

8.name: The Lovers loot box
8.description: All hearts suited cards, can contain special cards and modifiers.
8.details:
55% chance of getting a traditional Heart card
30% chance of getting Neon Heart card
10% chance of getting Heart Suit modifier
5% chance of getting 'All cards to heart' special
Loot box size 5

9.name: Special Bet loot box
9.description: Small loot box with chances of getting a special card or modifier
9.details:
5% chance of getting a special card
10% chance of getting a modifier
85% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 3

10.name: Neon loot box
10.description: An exclusive loot box filled with neon cards
10.details:
97% chance of getting a neon card
3% chance of getting a Neon Joker 
Loot box size 5
